snippet: Politicians and others at the end of a Jon Stewart punch line insist that his parting from “The Daily Show” will be such sweet sorrow.
abstract: Politicians across country lament announcement that Jon Stewart will step down as host of The Daily Show, despite serving as butt of his satire for years; interviews reveal that Stewart's subjects harbored both a fear and admiration for his ability to shape popular perception, particularly among young people.
lead_paragraph: Politicians and others at the end of a Jon Stewart punch line insist that his parting from “The Daily Show” will be such sweet sorrow.
